get_channel_categories.title: Get all the categories in a channel
get_channel_categories.description: This method gets all the categories in the specified channel.

add_channel_categories.title: Add a list of categories to a channel
add_channel_categories.description: This method adds multiple categories to the specified channel.

delete_channel_category.title: Remove a category from a channel
delete_channel_category.description: This method removes a single category from the specified channel.

categorize_channel.title: Categorize a channel
categorize_channel.description: This method adds a channel to a category.

set_channel_privacy_user.title: Permit a specific user to view a private channel
set_channel_privacy_user.description: This method gives a single user access to the specified private channel.

add_channel_tag.title: Add a specific tag to a channel
add_channel_tag.description: This method adds a single tag to the specified channel.

The body of this request should follow our
[batch request format](https://developer.vimeo.com/api/common-formats#batch-requests). Each object must contain
a single `URI` field, and the value of this field must be the URI of the user who can view this video.

For information on utilizing OAuth client authorization, see our
[authentication](/api/authentication#generate-unauthenticated-tokens) documentation or the
[Client Credentials Grant](https://tools.ietf.org/html/draft-ietf-oauth-v2-31#section-4.4) section of the
[OAuth spec](https://tools.ietf.org/html/draft-ietf-oauth-v2-31.
